name: Rainbow Blitz
description:
Rainbow Blitz is a fast paced, challenging and beautifully designed game that takes the colours of the rainbow to your phone/tablet! Blast between the rainbows to beat your high score while collecting coins to unlock new shapes to use in-game! The simple, one-tap controls will get you straight into the game and playing in seconds!

FEATURES:

★ Beautiful, colourful graphics will keep you playing!

★ A challenging but rewarding experience

★ Updated every month with new content!

★ Fast paced game-play to keep the action at a high!

★ No in-app purchases, hidden bills etc. Completely free!

Please consider supporting Pixal Games on Patreon

Follow Pixal .inc on Twitter for updates
